Audio.Locality: Serra da Cantareira, Guarulhos, Sao Paulo state
Audio.Author: Jeremy Minns
Audio.Comments: Call D. Classification as in our DVD-ROM 'Birds of Brazil' Montane forest. Natural calls by a pair after one of them was flushed from their nest. At first only the male is calling. It was then joined by the female and in the second cut only the female is calling.
